name: Live! Social Casino
description:
Play real casino slots at Live! Social Casino

We’ve got all your favorite casino games like China Shores, African Diamond, Roaming Reels, Blackjack, Roulette and many more!

But that’s not all – we’ve also got free credits, daily promotions and many other exciting features waiting for you…

Play all the slots you love from the casino on your iPhone or iPad. We’ve authentically recreated all the sights and sounds so you can enjoy the best real casino games any time of day or place.

Every day you play we give you a free bonus! Play every day and watch your bonus grow! Play against your friends on our leaderboards where we give players even more prizes! You can also get Live! Rewards™ points which are redeemable at all participating Live! properties.

We provide 24/7 customer support, if you ever need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact our friendly and dedicated customer services team at support@livecasino.social

Live! Rewards™ points are subject to terms and conditions and membership in the Live! Rewards program.

Play Social Casino Games at LiveCasino.social.

These games are intended for use only by those 21 older, and only for amusement purposes.
The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
Malfunction voids all play and reward.

Gambling Problem? Call 1-800-522-4700 FREE
